channel.title: RE: Trisidia ll Scammed me 22$ ll Prof
channel.description:
Hello Yesterday 13 July 2013 i was asked Trisidia for a vps , But he Scammed me 22$ -_- i got the prof , ScreenShoot , I know i cant get refund But don't trust him Anymore...
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/snl7h5.png[/img]
I asked him what is a good Vps , and how i setup it !
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/sew3ll.png[/img]
Here Trisida Told me how to Change Details / password of the Vps !
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/105nwav.png[/img]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/6sdg04.png[/img]
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/nohqgg.png[/img]
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2cf6v0n.png[/img]
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2cf6v0n.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/wr04g9.png[/img]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/sb3rl1.png[/img]
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/14awvar.png[/img]
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/vzwpah.png[/img]
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/3343yfo.png[/img]
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/6dycgi.png[/img]
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/140kldg.png[/img]
There all profs i Sent him the moneys -_- Still no have the vps Details ...

item.title: RE: Trisidia ll Scammed me 22$ ll Prof
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“dawsonsmokes, post:12, topic:524952”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=643645.msg4332262#msg4332262 date=1373829640]

Lmao trisidia isn’t the real owners name FARIS? why don’t you call paypal and dispute it and get your money back when disputing make sure to type a long paragraph and make it sem like you are pissede off and say it will escalate to a paypal claim that always works for me if a scam has happened

Faris made IndidiaX, not TrisidiaX.
[/quote]

XD I knew it was one of them they both blow so it’s okay lol don’t trust ppl on skype not even for links half of them can be rats :/[/quote]
Faris is actually pretty good if you visit R-S.

Read full topic

item.title: RE: Trisidia ll Scammed me 22$ ll Prof
item.dc:creator: @dawsonsmokes dawsonsmokes
item.description:
@dawsonsmokes wrote:

HcoJustin:

You could have paid half of that for the same thing through a valid hosting company, and not been scammed… Why would you trust a kiddie for anything?

Prime examples of good vps are trentahost (never had problems fast setup fast support pavhost fortatrust. + much more I am not listing right now lol

item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

Anyway, I don’t know why you would GIFT (I say this because you cannot charge back gifts) money to a person that is highly untrusted. You know damn well you aren’t going to get what you asked for. The kid can’t even spell correctly, let alone actually make a decent server.

Hope you learned your lesson.
